Package database

Class Queries

java.lang.Object
database.Queries
public abstract class Queries extends Object
This class defines the methods that allow the application to retrieve information from the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment>
    getAllAppointments()
    The getAllAppointments method sends a query statement to the database and collects all the appointments from the appointments table.

    The getAllFirst method sends a query statement to the database and collects all the first level divisions from the first_level_divisions table.

    The getAllUsers method sends a query statement to the database and collects all the users from the users table.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      The getAllAppointments method sends a query statement to the database and collects all the appointments from the appointments table. It then adds them to an observable list that can be accessed and manipulated by the application.
      Returns:
      An observable list of Appointment objects.
